name: pics
description: Find actor, scene, movie, studio images based on local files. GIF support.

arguments.name: dry
arguments.description: Whether to commit data changes

arguments.name: actors
arguments.description: Array of picture search configurations for actors

arguments.name: actors.[0]
arguments.description: One configuration for a type of actor picture

arguments.name: actors.[0].prop
arguments.description: The type of picture that should be attached to the actor. Set to `'extra'` to add any image you want to the gallery

arguments.name: actors.[0].path
arguments.description: The path in which to search for this picture

arguments.name: actors.[0].searchTerms
arguments.description: Extra terms that the picture path should contain

arguments.name: actors.[0].blacklistTerms
arguments.description: Terms that should not be found in an image path

arguments.name: actors.[0].mustMatchInFilename
arguments.description: If the name of the actor and the `searchTerms` must be matched against the filename, instead of the file path

arguments.name: actors.[0].max
arguments.description: Only needed for an `'extra'` search configuration: how many max images to get. Do not define or use a negative number to get all. You can otherwise omit this property
